trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Niles
There were no other sightings in Niles on or around February 10th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and i saw this atleast 3 or 4 times in the last week. i have been involved with SETILive, tracking e.t's ... there is alot of activity going on around us. my description of this u.f.o is that is was moving really slow, and it had lights all over it, and they flashed in sequence, like a police light.it was triangle shaped. it's quite crazy, we've seen quite alot occur since i've gotten more into seti and stuff. maybe they're trying to make contact?, i don't know. unfortunatley, i have no media to present.
Summary: my wife and i saw this 3 or 4 times.
